subtitle: A tempting lunch - a creamy filling of smoked salmon and dill.

method.text: In a jug, beat together the egg, cream, dill and seasoning.
Melt the butter in a saucepan. Add the egg mixture. Cook very gently for 5 min or until mixture begins to thicken.
Remove from heat. Stir until creamy. Spoon the filling into the cooked potatoes.
Cut the salmon into strips. Roll into small rolls. Top the potatoes with the salmon.

title: Smoked salmon filling for baked potatoes
